about_the_game:
Welcome back to another year of late stage capitalism at Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times, the #1 holiday store for all your spooky costume needs! Unfortunately, you are not working at the #1 store in the franchise. Probably like #8. We didn't specify a number because it doesn't really matter for gameplay. That much.

What matters most is that your employer, MacEmpire, can and probably will fire you and all of your friends if you do a bad job at selling fine wares this season!

Step 1) Hunt monsters with your monster hunters (Also: train them first so they don't die)

Step 2) Craft them into awesome costumes

Step 3) Sell them to people for money

Step 4) PROFIT!

Manage a team of 8 Spook Experts (read: grumpy part-time employees) in a world where the economy is run on selling the byproducts of a monster hunt. Don't think about the fact that the cute lil' unicorn costume you just sold was made from the hide of a bloodthirsty creature. That's just weird. 

Try to deal with customers the best you can! Upsell items! Train your staff! Try to avoid any (big) HR complaints!

Oh, did we mention that you have to do all this while keeping your sanity as the outside world falls further and further into a fascist state? Well, you do! (I don't know why we put an exclamation point right there. That's not funny)

  • Train and utilize a staff of 8 through five acts of retail doom. Make sure that they have the stats to take on the day!

  • Make sure that your team of 4 monster hunters have everything they need in order to bring home the best monsters the wilds have to offer! You don't want to sell BAD monster hides, now do you?

  • PC, Linux

  • Visual Novel with light RPG and Management elements

name: Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times: Spit's Quest
short_description: Hunt monsters! Turn those monsters into costumes! Profit! Try to keep your sanity while working a minimum wage seasonal retail job in a society quickly crumbling into a dictatorship!
